languages.text: "{name}! Как славно, что я застала вас здесь". {n}Неконтролируемое волнение захлестывает ваше тело, перебивая дыхание. Заметив это, Кассия прикрывает глаза, и хватка чужих эмоций ослабевает.{/n} "Простите. Мои силы... порой стремятся выйти из-под контроля".

traits.locale_text: "{name}! Как славно, что я застала вас здесь". {n}Неконтролируемое волнение захлестывает ваше тело, перебивая дыхание. Заметив это, Кассия прикрывает глаза, и хватка чужих эмоций ослабевает.{/n} "Простите. Мои силы... порой стремятся выйти из-под контроля".

languages.text: "{name}! How wonderful it is that I've found you here." {n}Uncontrollable anxiety washes over your body, causing you to lose your breath. Cassia notices this, closes her eyes, and you are released from the grip of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Please forgive me. My powers... are sometimes too insistent in their attempts to break free from my control."

Cassia notices this, closes her eyes, and you are released from the grip of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Please forgive me. My powers... are sometimes too insistent in their attempts to break free from my control."

languages.text: 「{name}様！ここでお会いできて、とても嬉しく思います」{n}抑えられない不安があなたの身体に押し寄せ、息をするのも忘れさせる。カシアがその様子に気づいて目を閉じると、あなたは自分のものではない感情の支配から解放される。{/n}「お許しください。力が…あたくしの制御を逃れようと激しく試みるときがあるのです」
languages.original_text: "{name}! How wonderful it is that I've found you here." {n}Uncontrollable anxiety washes over your body, causing you to lose your breath. Cassia notices this, closes her eyes, and you are released from the grip of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Please forgive me. My powers... are sometimes too insistent in their attempts to break free from my control."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}様！ここでお会いできて、とても嬉しく思います」{n}抑えられない不安があなたの身体に押し寄せ、息をするのも忘れさせる。カシアがその様子に気づいて目を閉じると、あなたは自分のものではない感情の支配から解放される。{/n}「お許しください。力が…あたくしの制御を逃れようと激しく試みるときがあるのです」

languages.text: “{name}！能见到你真是太好了！”{n}你心中突然涌起了无法控制的焦虑，几乎让你喘不过气。卡西娅留意到了这一点，马上闭上了眼睛，你也摆脱了外界情绪的控制。{/n}“请原谅，我的力量……有的时候过于顽固，总是想要挣脱我的控制。”
languages.original_text: "{name}! How wonderful it is that I've found you here." {n}Uncontrollable anxiety washes over your body, causing you to lose your breath. Cassia notices this, closes her eyes, and you are released from the grip of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Please forgive me. My powers... are sometimes too insistent in their attempts to break free from my control."

traits.locale_text: “{name}！能见到你真是太好了！”{n}你心中突然涌起了无法控制的焦虑，几乎让你喘不过气。卡西娅留意到了这一点，马上闭上了眼睛，你也摆脱了外界情绪的控制。{/n}“请原谅，我的力量……有的时候过于顽固，总是想要挣脱我的控制。”

languages.text: « {name} ! Quelle chance de vous trouver ici ! » {n}Vous êtes soudain {mf|submergé|submergée} par une anxiété incontrôlable qui vous coupe le souffle. Remarquant votre réaction, Cassia ferme les yeux et vous libère de ces émotions qui ne sont pas les vôtres.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi. Mes pouvoirs... s'obstinent parfois un peu trop à se soustraire à mon contrôle. »
languages.original_text: "{name}! How wonderful it is that I've found you here." {n}Uncontrollable anxiety washes over your body, causing you to lose your breath. Cassia notices this, closes her eyes, and you are released from the grip of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Please forgive me. My powers... are sometimes too insistent in their attempts to break free from my control."

traits.locale_text: « {name} ! Quelle chance de vous trouver ici ! » {n}Vous êtes soudain {mf|submergé|submergée} par une anxiété incontrôlable qui vous coupe le souffle. Remarquant votre réaction, Cassia ferme les yeux et vous libère de ces émotions qui ne sont pas les vôtres.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi. Mes pouvoirs... s'obstinent parfois un peu trop à se soustraire à mon contrôle. »

languages.text: «¡{name}! ¡Qué ilusión me hace encontrarle aquí!». {n}Una ansiedad incontrolable te invade el cuerpo hasta dejarte casi sin aliento. Cassia se da cuenta, cierra los ojos y te libera de esas poderosas emociones que no son las tuyas.{/n} «Por favor, discúlpeme. Mis poderes... a veces se muestran muy procaces en sus intentos por escapar a mi control».
languages.original_text: "{name}! How wonderful it is that I've found you here." {n}Uncontrollable anxiety washes over your body, causing you to lose your breath. Cassia notices this, closes her eyes, and you are released from the grip of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Please forgive me. My powers... are sometimes too insistent in their attempts to break free from my control."

traits.locale_text: «¡{name}! ¡Qué ilusión me hace encontrarle aquí!». {n}Una ansiedad incontrolable te invade el cuerpo hasta dejarte casi sin aliento. Cassia se da cuenta, cierra los ojos y te libera de esas poderosas emociones que no son las tuyas.{/n} «Por favor, discúlpeme. Mis poderes... a veces se muestran muy procaces en sus intentos por escapar a mi control».

languages.text: "{name}! Wie wunderbar, dass ich Euch hier finde." {n}Unkontrollierbare Unruhe überrollt deinen Körper, so dass dir der Atem stock. Cassia bemerkt das, schließt die Augen, und du wirst aus der Umklammerung der Emotionen freigegeben, die nicht deine eigenen sind.{/n} "Bitte vergebt mir. Meine Kräfte sind manchmal zu hartnäckig in ihren Versuchen, sich von meiner Kontrolle zu befreien."
languages.original_text: "{name}! How wonderful it is that I've found you here." {n}Uncontrollable anxiety washes over your body, causing you to lose your breath. Cassia notices this, closes her eyes, and you are released from the grip of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Please forgive me. My powers... are sometimes too insistent in their attempts to break free from my control."

traits.locale_text: "{name}! Wie wunderbar, dass ich Euch hier finde." {n}Unkontrollierbare Unruhe überrollt deinen Körper, so dass dir der Atem stock. Cassia bemerkt das, schließt die Augen, und du wirst aus der Umklammerung der Emotionen freigegeben, die nicht deine eigenen sind.{/n} "Bitte vergebt mir. Meine Kräfte sind manchmal zu hartnäckig in ihren Versuchen, sich von meiner Kontrolle zu befreien."

languages.text: "{name}! Ne iyi ettin de geldin." {n}Tüm vücudunu dizginlenemez bir kaygı sarıp nefessiz kalmana sebep oluyor. Cassia bunu fark edince gözlerini kapatıyor, sen de onun hissettiği duyguların pençesinden kurtuluyorsun.{/n} "Affet beni lütfen. Güçlerim... Bazen hâkimiyetimden kurtulmakta çok ısrarcılar."
languages.original_text: "{name}! How wonderful it is that I've found you here." {n}Uncontrollable anxiety washes over your body, causing you to lose your breath. Cassia notices this, closes her eyes, and you are released from the grip of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Please forgive me. My powers... are sometimes too insistent in their attempts to break free from my control."

traits.locale_text: "{name}! Ne iyi ettin de geldin." {n}Tüm vücudunu dizginlenemez bir kaygı sarıp nefessiz kalmana sebep oluyor. Cassia bunu fark edince gözlerini kapatıyor ve bir başkasından gelen o duyguların pençesinden kurtulabiliyorsun.{/n} "Affet beni lütfen. Güçlerim... Bazen güçlerim, hâkimiyetimden kurtulmakta çok ısrarcı."
